about_the_game:
This set includes the following DLC:
- Crow's Branch Campus Uniform
- Elie's Easternwear
- Alisa's Easternwear
- Tio's Easternwear
- Altina's Easternwear
- Lapis' Easternwear
- Nadia's Easternwear
- Noel's Easternwear
- Eastern Commander Set (Commander Rean, Commander Lloyd, Commander C)
- Commander C Sans Mask
- Eastern Warrior Set (Warrior Crow, Warrior Randy, Warrior Swin)

*These items can be claimed from the DLC tab on the Item page. After obtaining the items, they can be equipped from the Costume page on the Camp Menu.
